wikipedia_page.main: Charles R. MacIver (26 October 1890 – 25 April 1981) was British sailing competitor at the 1908 Summer Olympics. Sources give his name as Charles Ronald MacIver, the son of Charles MacIver.He was a crew member on the Mouchette which finished second of two teams competing in the 12 metre class. At the time, only the helmsman and mate were awarded silver medals, while the crew received bronze medals. However, MacIver is credited as having received a silver medal in the official Olympic database.
